name: Pyramid (itch) (Alligator Truck)
description:
You are Yuharro, the immortal, undead defender of "Pyramid" -a multidemensional vessel stationed at the convergence of 1000 universes. Blast your way thru hordes of hostile invaders from the dark dimension using magic, might, and your warrior instinct.

  • 15 different enemy classes
  • Lightning fast bullet hell action 
  • Vivid original soundscapes by GYPTXVN
  • Challenging and nostalgic arcade playstyle

------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

Keyboard and Mouse

WSAD - Movement

Mouse - Look Around/Aim

Left Click - Shoot (Hold down for Auto-Fire)

Right Click - Melee Attack

Spacebar- Jump and DoubleJump

C- Boost (also doubles as a melee attack)

P- Pause Game

Controller (using XBOX controller as a reference)

Left Analog-  Movement

Right Analog- Look Around/Aim

Right Trigger-  Shoot (Hold down for Auto-Fire)

Right Shoulder Button- Melee Attack

A Button (or Bottom Face Button)-  Jump and DoubleJump

Left Shoulder Button- Boost (also doubles as a melee attack)

Start Button- Pause Game

Boosting also momentarily makes you impervious to attacks. When timed right this strategy can be very effective.

Do not fall in the water. 

------------------------------------------------------------------

RELEASE NOTES

I made this game in 6 weeks and will definitely be revisiting this world again soon.  I wanted to put together a vertical slice that showcased the game mechanics in a fun and addictive game loop. The next iteration will be focused on linear level design, which is taking me a while to get a hang of but I'm going to do my best to tell a great story in a thematic and engaging gameplay experience.

I hope you guys enjoy playing this game as much as I did making it. Your feedback is 100% welcome and encouraged. Please leave a comment below and stay tuned for more games and updates.
